description: Lyophilised (i.e., freeze-dried) human plasma, type AB
full_summary:
Generated on: 2023-10-06

## Summary

This announcement serves as an Advance Contract Award Notice for the procurement of Lyophilised (freeze-dried) human plasma, type AB. The solicitation number is WS4242005130, and the tender closing date was October 19, 2023, at 14:00:00. This procurement was specifically limited to contractors holding exclusive rights due to the nature of the product, which is designed for military use.

### Product Specifications

The required product is Lyophilised (freeze-dried) human plasma, type AB. 

### Tender Details

- **Solicitation Number**: WS4242005130
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 19, 2023, at 14:00:00
- **Procurement Category**: Goods
- **Procurement Method**: Advance Contract Award Notice

### Supplier Requirements

- **Trade Agreements**: This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:
  - Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  - Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  - World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  - Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  - Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  - Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  - Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  - Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
  - Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  - Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  - Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  - North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

### Contracting Entity

- **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contact Person**: Lina Chan (SPAC/PSPC) (elle-la/she-her)
- **Contact Email**: [lina.chan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lina.chan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Contact Information**: (No phone or fax number was provided)
